article_title: Charisse E. Millett, candidate for Alaska State Representative District 25, answers questions about the issues
article_text: I believe in Alaska! This is truly the land of opportunity, and serving in public office is a way to give back to the State I have lived in since birth. I want to help shape the state for future generations, and Alaskans of all ages. Ensuring we have world class educational opportunities, a healthy vibrant economy and a place that people want to live and raise a family, and retire in is paramount. There is no challenge to great that we cannot overcome if we all work together.

article_metadata.description: Alaska Dispatch News asked candidates for state office questions on a range of issues. Here are answers from Charisse E. Millett, candidate for Alaska State Representative, District 25.

og.description: Alaska Dispatch News asked candidates for state office questions on a range of issues. Here are answers from Charisse E. Millett, candidate for Alaska State Representative, District 25.

article_summary:
I want to help shape the state for future generations, and Alaskans of all ages.
This is truly the land of opportunity, and serving in public office is a way to give back to the State I have lived in since birth.
There is no challenge to great that we cannot overcome if we all work together.
Ensuring we have world class educational opportunities, a healthy vibrant economy and a place that people want to live and raise a family, and retire in is paramount.
I believe in Alaska!
